root.name: One Piece: Treasure Wars 2 - Welcome to Buggyland
root.description: Story GameplayMuch like the first Treasure Wars the player is to race to the treasure first. This time though the player choose one of the straw hats and battle against Buggy the Clown and his crew. New to the Straw hats is Nico Robin.Playable CharactersMonkey D Luffy Roronoa Zoro Nami Usopp Tony Tony Chopper Sanji Nico Robin
